pages.text: From the inside，the $(item)Phobaryllis$() is filled with chambers of mucus.$(br)Touching it lets a chill run down your spine，and the flower itself produces some weird noises，now and then，too.$(br2)Meditating near this is definitely $(marked)unsettling$().

The Phobaryllis is created by swallowing a $(l:vitalis/entry_seed)Dormant Seed$() while under the emotion of $(marked)fear$().$(br)The person swallowing the seed must be in the $(marked)Nether$()，at least under height 20，with at least two entities nearby.$(br2)The pressure of both the planet and the company weighs stronger than expected$().
